item.description:
Networking happy hour - 5.30-8pm - at front bar or in the back. If nobody is in front, check the back! If nobody is there yet, wait, we usually have 10-20 people. Suggestions welcome for other events. Networking will be monthly at 116 Crown, 2nd Wednesday at 5.30-8.30pm rain or shine.

Some folks will be heading to dinner afterwards at Bentara, around the corner on Orange street. Will leave for dinner at 7.45pm. Others generally stay late at the bar.

Feel free to bring samples for show-and-tell.

Time: 5.30pm-8.30pm
Date: Wednesday, February 11
Place: 116 Crown, downtown New Haven

Please RSVP!

- David
item.how_to_find_us: Front bar or back raised area
item.name: GNH Design and Marketing February Meetup
